title: 进入游戏大概半分钟左右就会崩，求解
author: yanrill
txt_content:
昨天玩还没有出错，玩了半个多月的存档了，今天开始就一直出问题，重启什么都不管事，错误报告如下，求大神们救命！
     Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception ticking world

A full error report has been saved to C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\桌面\yan整合\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-10-30_16.04.37-server.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.txt_content: 这好像是一个万圣节的恶作剧，你把日期改一下或者开和平就应该行了

replies.author: yanrill
replies.txt_content:
1403718476 发表于 2013-10-30 19:56 
这好像是一个万圣节的恶作剧，你把日期改一下或者开和平就应该行了
我C A O！这TM也太扯了吧，恶作剧！改了日期还真好了，有病吧这！
